pages.text: $(4)FTB Chunks has been removed. This entry remains here for archival purposes.

This is a tutorial on how to force load chunks with FTB Chunks without the use of mods that add chunk loaders as a block. $(br2)To claim a chunk, press M to open the world map then look at the very top left corner. There should be a small map icon. Clicking this will open a smaller window.

Simply click the individual squares in this smaller window to claim chunks. Ownership limitations can be seen on the bottom left corner when looking at this screen. $(br2)If you prefer using actual chunk loaders that come in the form of a block, look at the $(l:genesis/chunk_loaders)Chunk Loaders$() entry instead. $(br2)For issues with Deployers not working in claimed chunks, see the $(l:genesis/broken_deployer)Create Deployer Fix$() entry.
